title: Walnut Canyon National Monument: Nearby Attractions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Nearby Attractions            Nearby Attractions                Be sure to visit the other Flagstaff Area National Monuments: Wupatki National Monument 45 mi Sunset Crater Volcano National Monument 25 mi Other National Park Service Areas Grand Canyon National Park 120 mi Montezuma Castle National Monument 70 mi Tuzigoot National Monument 57 mi  Petrified Forest National Park 90 mi  Glen Canyon National Recreation Area 160 mi   Other Attractions  Museum of Northern Arizona 15 mi  The Arboretum at Flagstaff 18 mi  Coconino National Forest 1 mi Riordan Mansion State Park 12 mi Meteor Crater 928-289-2362 38 mi  Homolovi Ruins State Park 928-289-4106 50 mi    Local Information Resources "Ancient Times" - the park newspaper Flagstaff Convention & Visitors Bureau td>
